name: Nyeh!
description:
You are Nyeh

A lonely goblin, who set out leaving your tribe behind. Searching the lands for a new home with your ogre friend, Onion, you stole a wagon from some adventurers! Now those pesky adventurers are chasing you down! Build defenses and gather resources to protect your caravan!

Collect resources. Build your defenses. Explore more than 12 unique areas as you make your way to a new home. Find safety in the night. And try not to perish.
